data.title: Sherwood Regional Library
data.meta_description: Fairfax County, Virginia - Sherwood Regional Library, located in Alexandria near historic Mount Vernon and Gum Springs, has been serving the needs of its community since 1971. data.text:
703-765-3645 | TTY: 711

Sherwood Regional Library, located in Alexandria near historic Mount Vernon and Gum Springs, has been serving the needs of its community since 1971. Sherwood Regional is the home of the local Mount Vernon Farmers' Market on Wednesday mornings from April into December. Our active senior customers know us as the home of Mount Vernon at Home, a membership organization that supports aging in place.

The TechLab on the second floor is open to the public where staff and volunteers provide hands-on technology classes and one-on-one computer tutoring sessions. Sherwood Regional partners with the American Association of Retired Persons to provide tax assistance. Our youngest customers (with their parents) enjoy the Read to Me room and the most studious can access private study carrels located on the main floor.

The Friends of the Sherwood Library raise money for programming and special purchases though their book sales and donations. We invite you to join our Friends and our volunteers to learn all the ways Sherwood benefits our community.

Sherwood's Sure-to-Love Selections:

Opportunities for Presenters, Authors and Speakers

Are you interested in presenting to an FCPL audience? We want to hear from you!

Book Sale

On the first floor, there is an ongoing book sale available all hours the branch is open. Additional sale areas are open Sunday from 1 to 3 p.m., Wednesday from 1 to 4 p.m., Saturdays 10 a.m. - 12 p.m., and the first Saturday of each month from 10 a.m. to 4 p.m. This will change to the second Saturday in a month when the first Saturday is a holiday.

Meeting Areas:

Reservations can be made for regular hours.

(Number of chairs limited, call branch to check availability)

Meeting Room: capacity 150

Conference Rooms: capacity 8-40

Group Study: capacity 4

Quiet Study Room: Yes

Children's Area: "Read to Me" room for children with parents or caregivers.

Special Collections: Korean, Spanish, Vietnamese Language Collection

Branch Services

Internet Access: 19 Internet stations with Microsoft Office plus wireless access is available.

Tech Lab hours:

Monday: Closed

Tuesday - Friday: 12 p.m. – 5 p.m.

Saturday and Sunday: 11a.m. – 4 p.m.

Parking: 153 parking spaces, 6 accessible.

"Library to Go" Book Selection Service - help your library select just the right books for you to grab and go. Take a couple minutes to complete this form. We'll be in touch when your handpicked bag is ready for pickup.

Library-Affiliated Organizations

Friends of the Sherwood Regional Library

The Farmers Market is open Wednesday mornings from April into December..

Architect

J.Russell Bailey (Original Building)

Lukemire Partnership, Inc.(Expansion)
